descriptionHtml:
This is a short and sweet treasure hunt after my first Skyrim player.
find out who he was and what he did in this land.
it all starts in a town called Whiterun just behind a house called Breezehome
4 in all to find for now

I did one like this in Oblivion and didn\'t go all that well, so I\'m hoping some would like 
more to it and if so just say so
And This is my first mod in Skyrim  
I did do a Small touch up on a set of armor at the end

Version 0.2

    added 3 more places to find making 7 in all 

Version 0.3

     some fixes and forgot to put in chest 5

Version 0.4

      fixed some more small things and finished it off for now
A total of 10 chests to find 
I also played with a Daedric sword but can\'t seem to swing it in the game
any help on this would be grate
author: SirDraconian
